text: "Cryin' Game" is a 1998 song by country singer Sara Evans and is the leading single from her second studio album No Place That Far. It went to number 56 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart and number 82 on the Canadian RPM Country Tracks chart. It was a minor hit for Evans. ==Track listing== CD single, 7" vinyl single * "Cryin' Game" – 2:53 * "Wait a Minute" – 2:43 ==References== Category:1998 songs Category:Country songs Category:Sara Evans songs
title: Cryin' Game
